content: This is true Laleland Florida, An eighth-grader was suspended from riding the school bus for three days after being accused of passing gas. ... Stuart Florida a 13-year-old student at a Stuart school was arrested breaking wind in class. *http://ktar.com/?nid=399&sid=1107626 This same area of Floria in the past several years: They were hit with five hurricanes, They have had three police officers murdered. Two teenagers arrested for plotting to blowup their schools, 21 men arrested for making online, arrangements to meet underage teens for sex, Five train/car crashes, Five girls were arrested for beating down another teen and posting the video on u-tube, Florida's largest hi-way crash with a couple of dozen cars in evolved, Three young children have been murdered, and at least two of the 9/11 pilots terrorists received some pilot training in the Lakeland area. But, it's good to see they haven't lost their priorities. --------------------- Way back in junior high, one of the boys was sent to the principal's office to to get a paddling from the principal for cutting a big smelly fart. He told the principal he couldn't control them - they just happened. When he bent over to get his paddling he cut one loose right in the principal's face. It was so loud the secretary ran in to see what was happening. But it stunk so much that they had to evacuate the office area. By the time everything was over the principal forgot to paddle the kid. God and the soldier, All men adore, In time of trouble, And no more; For when war is over, And all things righted, God is neglected - The old soldier slighted. Founding Member Original DVG & Proud Member, Rupterd Duck/Derelict Veterans

content: When We were in fourth or fifth grade there was a kid that loved to rip off loud farts. He came up to the blackboard and decided to rip off a big one. The problem is he had diarrhea but didn't know it till right then. I guess y'all can figure out what happened. Everyone in the class was laughing so hadt the teacher dismissed us and the kid's mother couldn't get him to go back to school for a week. He never did live it down. Ended up his parents moved to a different town where they were unknown. How come I pressed "One for English" and still can't understand a word the dude is saying?

content: aaaaaaaah the days of slingshots, pea-shooters, and of course my beloved rubberband gun. Of course the good old plastic straw and spit wads trick was a gooder too. But my best WMD was passing gas in the hallway between classes. One Flag......One Heart......One Nation............EVERMORE
